item.title: I am not a mathematician
item.description: Studying mathematics is rewarding, working as a mathematician is not. Moreover, the reputation of mathematicians made it difficult for me to find a job outside academia.

item.title: Things from Graz
item.description: I spent the last year in Graz working on my master's thesis and for my first (and last) job as a researcher. To recap the experience, I wrote in random order random stuff that caught my eye. Don't expect anything, it's just a "list of things".
